description: This file defines a set of functions for managing notes within a frontend service, interfacing with a Supabase backend. The functions include listing notes, fetching a single note, creating, updating, deleting notes, and toggling favorites. It imports the 'supabase' client for database interactions.

methods.name: listNotes({ userId, search = '', tag = null, folder = null, sort = 'updated_at_desc', favoritesFirst = false })
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes for a specific user, with optional search, filtering by tag or folder, sorting, and prioritizing favorites.

methods.name: getNote(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its unique ID, scoped by Row-Level Security.

methods.name: createNote({ userId, title = '', content = '', tags = [], folder = null })
methods.description: Creates a new note entry for a user with optional title, content, tags, and folder.

methods.name: updateNote(id, patch)
methods.description: Updates a note identified by its ID with provided patch data, also updating the 'updated_at' timestamp.

methods.name: deleteNote(id)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: toggleFavorite(id, value)
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a note.

ctags.name: createNote
ctags.pattern: /^export async function createNote({ userId, title = '', content = '', tags = [], folder = null })/
ctags.signature: ({ userId, title = '', content = '', tags = [], folder = null })

ctags.name: listNotes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listNotes({ userId, search = '', tag = null, folder = null, sort = 'update/
ctags.signature: ({ userId, search = '', tag = null, folder = null, sort = 'updated_at_desc', favoritesFirst = false })
